glsa.title: Doomsday: Format string vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: Format string vulnerabilities in Doomsday may lead to the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: Doomsday is a modern gaming engine for popular ID games like Doom, Heretic and Hexen.

description.p: Luigi Auriemma discovered that Doomsday incorrectly implements formatted printing.

impact.p: A remote attacker could exploit these vulnerabilities to execute arbitrary code with the rights of the user running the Doomsday server or client by sending specially crafted strings.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Doomsday users should upgrade to the latest version:
